attributes.action: initiate an enquiry by the Serious Fraud Office into the spiralling costs of the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public now know the likely cost of the London Olympics, some four times the original figure bandied about.  The original costs appear to have been deliberately kept small and as a taxpayer I object to that.  Now's the time for the SFO to see if fraud has been perpetrated on the taxpaying public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
